name: Art of Reality
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1Controls Control nameKeyboardGamepadMovementA/D keys, right / left arrowsleft joystick, d-pad (right / left)Runleft/right shiftrb1 / rb2 buttonsJumpspacewest buttonInteractionE keysouth buttonVisit paintingsW key / up arrowleft joystick, d-pad (up)Pick up / place objectsS key / down arrowleft joystick, d-pad (down)Pause menuescape / tabright menu button

Are you an art fan? We hope so because you can view multiple paintings in our continously expanding gallery. Would you like to know more about a painting? Why don't you hop in and take a closer look?
